page.title: 17OTHER SOCIETIES IN DUNSFORD
page.content: In the past small communities had to create their own entertainment.With increased personal transport this is no longer true but thankfully the community spirit still survives here. With a small population many people will be members of several societies. This helps to promote cooperation.What is most noticable is the way in which a person will be a leading organiser at one event and a minor helper or a passive onlooker at another without jealousy or criticism. In addition to the D.A.D.S.there are many societies in this area including- Women's Institute, British legion, P.T.A.,Junior Sports Club,Cricket Club Charity Action and Fund Raising Groups Church based Societies and Royal Oak based teams.
